definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Therefore two sewing machine needles have carried on the pointed development to these two localizations .
sentences.chinese: 於是兩車針對這兩個定位進行了針對性的開發。

sentences.english: The PC series are the reels we specially developed in the recent period.
sentences.chinese: PC系列是我廠最近針對性開發的線盤。

sentences.english: At last, the countermeasure and suggestion were given pertinently.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了有針對性的對策和建議。

sentences.english: Of those in the targeted-trial group, 29% responded positively to the therapy.
sentences.chinese: 當然在針對性試驗組中，29%志願者的治療成功。

sentences.english: This could include an international arms embargo and other targeted sanctions on Burma.
sentences.chinese: 這可包括國際性的武器禁運令和其他針對性的制裁。

sentences.english: Our help had to be targeted.
sentences.chinese: 我們的幫助必須有針對性。

sentences.english: The following section provides "nuts-and-bolts" suggestions for workers.
sentences.chinese: 下一章節會給心理救援者提供具有針對性的建議。

sentences.english: Measures should be taken pertinently to receive challenges.
sentences.chinese: 應有針對性地採取措施，迎接挑戰。

sentences.english: The report condemns America's scattershot approach to training workers.
sentences.chinese: 該報告譴責美國對工人的培訓毫無針對性。

sentences.english: The contents of legal education should be an unification of catholicity and pertinence.
sentences.chinese: 法學教育的內容應是普遍性與針對性的統一。

sentences.english: Third, it can make the market educate and guide the investors pointedly.
sentences.chinese: 有針對性的對廣大投資者進行教育引導。

sentences.english: The pointed trefoil begins to setup a unified system.
sentences.chinese: 有針對性的三葉開始設置一個統一的系統。

sentences.english: And then can constitute reconnaissance and counter reconnaissance strategy.
sentences.chinese: 從而有針對性地制定偵察和反偵察策略。

sentences.english: The tax policy is not well-directed and helpful.
sentences.chinese: 稅收政策缺乏針對性，優惠範圍不大。

sentences.english: The literary circles of U. S also introduced Lao She.
sentences.chinese: 對於老舍本人，美國文壇也作了具有針對性的介紹。

sentences.english: Besides, some counter measures alleviating the damage are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 針對性地提出了關於減輕鋼軌傷損的對策措施。
